name: RPG 9000
description:
The most advanced RPG you have ever experienced! You can do anything! there are so many buttons! Play here!

* Only a few sacrifices had to be made in terms of gameplay to achieve such versatile POSSIBILITIES

Play RPG 9000 today You just WON’T be disappointed.

** Note: Music hasn’t been implemented yet but trust me, it sounds REALLY GOOD.

*** WARNING: DO NOT PET THE CAT
